Package org.jcvi.jillion.trace.chromat.ztr

ZTR Format can store sanger trace data more efficiently than the SCFv3 format.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ZtrChromatogram
    ZtrChromatogram is a ZTR specific implementation Chromatogram that has an extra field for the clip points.
    ZtrChromatogramFileVisitor
    ZTRChromatogramFileVisitor is a ChromatogramFileVisitor that has additional visitXXX methods for ZTR specific fields.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ZtrChromatogramBuilder
    ZtrChromatogramBuilder uses the Builder Pattern to build a ZtrChromatogram instance.
    ZtrChromatogramParser
    ZtrChromatogramParser parses Chromatogram files encoded in ZTR format.
    ZtrChromatogramWriterBuilder
    ZtrChromatogramWriterBuilder builds a ChromatogramWriter implementation that performs the same encoding operations in the same order as the Staden IO_Lib C module.

Package org.jcvi.jillion.trace.chromat.ztr Description

ZTR Format can store sanger trace data more efficiently than the SCFv3 format. ZTR format is used by the NCBI Trace Archive.
Author:
dkatzel
See Also:
ZTR SPEC v1.2, Bonfield, J.K. and Staden, R. (2002) ZTR: a new format for DNA sequence trace data. Bioinformatics Vol. 18 no. 1 3-10
